textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Nikki Watson 02/14/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 11 out of 16 people found this review useful. 4 people found this inaccurate. 3 of 47 Categories Comments Campus Safety just read what i said above. i had to leave for safety issues. i dont really care if people rate my comments badly. this is seriously for the people who really want to know what this college is like. Clubs and Activities there are a ton to choose from. but they don't do anything usefull for the most part. it is mostly ra-ra we are happy christians sort of thing. Great for these types of students holigans Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus the ras told my roommate secret places on campus to smoke..... Bang for the buck
